tls:text.tls:line: The indulgent Mother of the Mang [Family] of Wei

sense.def: of Wei; belonging to Wei

tls:text.tls:line: The indulgent Mother of the Mang [Family] of Wei

sense.def: loving, caring 慈母, benevolent, kin

tls:text.tls:line: The indulgent Mother of the Mang [Family] of Wei

sense.def: the mother of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: the daughter of the Meng Yang Family of Wei

sense.def: family branch, male lineage

tls:text.tls:line: the daughter of the Meng Yang Family of Wei

sense.def: daughter of (person or clan)

tls:text.tls:line: the daughter of the Meng Yang Family of Wei

sense.def: of Wei; belonging to Wei

tls:text.tls:line: and the second wife of Mang Mao

sense.def: second wife (of a widower)

tls:text.tls:line: the first wife's sons numbered five,

sense.def: former wife, late wife

tls:text.tls:line: the first wife's sons numbered five,

sense.def: son
be well-disposed towards support emotionally; have loving feelings towards and take loving care of (superiors)
loving, caring 慈母, benevolent, kin
the mother of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: his wife was having a love affair with a neighbor

sense.def: have an affair with, conduct a love affair with

tls:text.tls:line: and Duke Mu gave him Ying as his wife.

sense.def: cause to take as a wife> marry (one's daughter N2) off (to someone N1), give away as a wife (one's daughter N2) to (someone N1) 以其女妻之

tls:text.tls:line: Yu, who was about to escape and return [home],

sense.def: flee home

seg.line: 寡君使婢子侍執巾櫛以固子也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 寡君使婢子侍執巾櫛以固子也。
tls:text.tls:line: my own ruler has ordered me to wait on you, holding your towel and comb, to ensure your stay,

sense.def: I, your servant

tls:text.tls:line: and in spite of their harming him,

sense.def: like this
all objects; all objects completely
sing a peddler's song in the Shang mode
be a tragedy; be deeply tragic.
if (contrary to fact) GY: 若其予之 若其有知 "if they have awareness"
not only
not only
no matter whether V or not V, (in all cases)
no matter whether V or not V, (in all cases)
no matter whether V or not V, (in all cases)
